in the early 1800s , science was the pursui of gentlemen , something faraday was clearly not .
he had a rudimentary education , he 'd read widely , e 'd goe to public lectures , but in 1812 he was given tickets to hear sir humphry davy , the most prominent chemist of the age .
nineteenth-century scientists were the pop stars of their day .
their lectures were hugely popular .
